title: 3.8 Implement chunk receiving and validation (server)
description:
Implement server's handling of incoming file chunks.

## Server Side
- Receive FILE_CHUNK messages
- Decode base64 data to buffer
- Validate checksum matches decoded data
- Write chunk to temp file
- Update download progress
- If checksum fails: trigger retry (Phase 4)

## Temp File Strategy
- Create temp file: downloads/.tmp/{requestId}
- Append chunks in order
- Track received chunk indices

## Chunk Validation
```javascript
const decoded = Buffer.from(chunk.data, 'base64');
const isValid = verifyChecksum(decoded, chunk.checksum);
if (\!isValid) {
  // Trigger retry (Phase 4)
}
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- Server receives and decodes FILE_CHUNK
- Validates checksum for each chunk
- Valid chunks written to temp file
- Progress updated after each chunk
- Invalid chunks flagged for retry
